name: Rose and Lotus: Petals of Memories
name_original: Rose and Lotus: Petals of Memories
description:
I'm definitely going to escape from this house...!

[Rose and Lotus: Petals of Memories] is based on Korean traditional fairy tales 'Janghwa, Hongryeon'.
The main character, Rose, awake from the cold floor without her memory.
Find the truth behind the dark mansion and get out of it with your sister Lotus.




Key Features:
  • Point-and-Click Adventure in the Dark Mansion
  • A reinterpretation of traditional fairy tales
  • Unique artwork that varies from room to room
  • A well-organized configuration of various puzzles.
  • beautiful background music


How to play:
[Rose and Lotus: Petals of Memories] is a point-and-click game.
Observation and only the mouse are needed.
Click on the placed object -> Zoom in to find hidden clues
You must enter the correct answer for the puzzle or apply the item to the correct location.




Mission:
Rooms are connected to each other.
There are three to four puzzles in each room, and if you solve all the puzzles that make up the area, you will be given a clue to move to the next room.
The goal is to advance the room, reach the final destination, and leave the house.




Story:
Each section has an iconic story.
Cut-scene animation and simple conversation events tell you stories hidden in your home one by one.
When you solve the puzzle, you can you can approach the storyline naturally.





📢 Guidelines for Game Video and Streaming Broadcasts:
To prevent spoilers, game video and streaming broadcasts are allowed only up to [Chapter6: Engrave].
We kindly request your cooperation to accommodate a larger audience of gamers.
Thank you.
